author: Rebecca Klar
title: Whitmer defends stay-at-home order: 'We are seeing the curve start to flatten'
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) defended criticism of her state's aggressive stay-at-home order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus and said the measures are starting to flatten the curve. "Mi...
content:
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) defended criticism of her states aggressive stay-at-home order to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus and said the measures are starting to flatten the curve. 
Michigan right now has the third highest death count in the … [+2503 chars]
